textos_fuente.text: About Us | Pelican Lawn and Landscaping. Home Services Who We Serve About Us Contact Us Resources Careers Select Page About Us Delivering Top-Quality Workmanship & Accurate, Transparent Quotes View Our Work What We Do  Comprehensive Services We handle design, installation, and maintenance for flawless outdoor spaces.  Expert Care Specializing in irrigation, fertilization, pest control, tree trimming, and lighting.  Custom Solutions Serving associations, builders, commercial properties, and homeowners across Southwest Florida. About Pelican Lawn Care & Landscaping Pelican Lawn and Landscaping was established in 2006. We started out as a very small company and throughout the years have experienced tremendous success and growth. We now provide our services to many Associations, Builders, Commercial Properties and Single Family Home Owners throughout Southwest Florida. If you reside in the Southwest Florida area, you must call Pelican Lawn and Landscaping to receive your FREE consultation. We are the premier lawn and landscape company in Estero, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, and Naples. At Pelican Lawn and Landscaping, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional quality in every project. Our skilled team uses top-notch materials and techniques to ensure your outdoor spaces are both beautiful and functional. We offer detailed, transparent quotes for all services, ensuring no surprises and excellent value. For unmatched landscaping quality in Southwest Florida, trust Pelican Lawn and Landscaping. Contact Us Our Team Marco Marco is a German citizen and moved from Switzerland to Bonita Springs in 2015. After receiving his master’s degree in finance he’s worked for more than 20 years in Swiss Private Banking and Family Offices. He decided to move to Florida for personal reasons and purchased Pelican Lawn & Landscaping on January 1st, 2016. Marco is a very customer-oriented individual, and he wants to bring the customer service, customer satisfaction and communication to a higher level. He is solution driven; always trying to find new ideas to satisfy the customer’s needs. Today, with his high performing management team, he wants to grow the company but aim to remain a “family” size company where the customer needs and satisfaction must always drive our decisions and actions. He strongly believes that each customer is important and must receive the best level of service possible. – Marco Schauenburg, President & Owner Leo Vargas Leo has been in the Agriculture Industry for 20 years, 15 of those years in the lawn and landscaping industry. His family has a long history of working in the Agriculture Industry, and it can be said that he grew up within it. He was born and raised in sunny South Florida in the small city of Homestead and always had a passion for this work. Leo is eager to continue building his expertise and contributing to the industry he loves. – Leo Vargas, Account Manager Kathy Moran Kathy is originally from Michigan and moved to Florida in 1999 to escape the cold winters looking for warmer weather and sunshine. She has worked in the Accounting field for 38 years; she started out at a small business that sold rust proofing products to the auto industry. She has worked as the Office Manager for Pelican Lawn & Landscaping, Inc. since 2011 prior to Marco purchasing the company. She believes in Marco’s ideals regarding strengthening the relationships with all our customers through better customer service and communication. – Kathy Moran, Office Manager Arnold Ramirez Arnold has over 20 years in landscape management, he is all about creating lasting relationships and delivering top-notch service. As a General Manager, he works alongside our teams to ensure every client feels heard, respected, and thrilled with our results. His focus is on building trust, making a positive impact, and fostering open communication every step of the way. He believes in a hands-on approach, always going the extra mile, and making meaningful connections. When clients succeed, he succeeds, and that’s what drives him every day. Outside of work, he loves spending time with his wife and children; he has two daughters and a young son. Teaching them strong values and how to be good, responsible people is important to him, as he aims to raise a family that contributes positively to the community. He is also an avid hunter and fisherman, and loves being outdoors, experiencing nature at its best. – Arnold Ramirez, General Manager “I have been very impressed with the professionalism, knowledge, and service that your company has provided. The staff has transformed our OK landscape into the best-landscaped home in our community. I can’t thank you all enough for the tremendous service we have provided. You should be very proud of your services” Residents in the Mediterra Community, Naples, FL “I have been very impressed with the professionalism, knowledge, and service that your company has provided. The staff has transformed our OK landscape into the best-landscaped home in our community. I can’t thank you all enough for the tremendous service we have provided. You should be very proud of your services” Residents in the Mediterra Community, Naples, FL “I have been very impressed with the professionalism, knowledge, and service that your company has provided. The staff has transformed our OK landscape into the best-landscaped home in our community. I can’t thank you all enough for the tremendous service we have provided. You should be very proud of your services” Residents in the Mediterra Community, Naples, FL Who Are We Pelican Lawn & Landscaping has been proudly serving Southwest Florida since 2006. Our expert team is dedicated to providing top-quality landscaping services tailored to the unique needs of our region. Trust us to create and maintain beautiful, resilient outdoor spaces for your property. Hours Monday – Friday 7 am – 4 pm Saturday – Sunday Closed Contact Us  (239) 495-4553  office@pelicanlawn.com

Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club Homes For Sale in Venice Florida Search Search for: huntbrothersrealty.com Hunt Brothers Realty | Sarasota Florida Real Estate Home Buy Mortgage Buyer Info Sell Search Homes Advanced Search Map Search Listing ID (MLS #) Property Address Market Reports Cities We Service Our Listings Our Company Our Team About Contact Join Blog Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club is a gated, deed-restricted, golf community located in Venice, Florida. Potential buyers can expect to find a plethora of options distributed between several neighborhoods that can cater to an array of lifestyles. Single-family homes come in two, three, four, and even five bedroom options ranging in size from approximately 1,140 square feet up to 3,765 square feet with many of the homes featuring private pools and a minimum two-car garage. Villas are also an option in two and three bedroom floor plans ranging in size from approximately 1,100 square feet up to 1,800 square feet featuring open floor plans, screened-in lanais with views of the course or lakes, and an attached one or two-car garage. Spread across 1,000 acres of lush tropical landscape sits a 27-hole championship golf course designed by Ted McAnlis. A majestic 22,000 square foot clubhouse is the crowning jewel at Pelican Pointe where residents can rent out the banquet facilities to schedule their next family event in the beautifully remodeled grand ballroom. Other great amenities include state-of-the-art tennis courts, a fitness center, three sparkling pools including a Jr. Olympic pool, a lounge for entertaining and fine dining where lunch is served seven days a week along with an early light dinner. This master-planned community has something for everyone and is perfect for outdoor relaxation and sports enthusiasts alike. Conveniently located just minutes to the Gulf beaches, historic downtown Venice, fine dining, entertainment, shopping, and so much more! Community Highlights: • Deed Restricted • Gated Community – Designed by Sam Rodgers • Maintenance Included • 22,000 sq. ft Clubhouse • 3 Community Swimming Pools and a Jr. Olympic Pool • State-of-the-Art Fitness Center • 2 State-of-the-Art Tennis Courts • 27-Hole Championship Golf Facility Designed by Ted McAnlis • 25  Station Turf Grass Driving Range • 8,000 sq. ft. Putting Green • Chipping Green, Bunker Green, and Pitching Green • Pro Shop • Lounge & Dining Facilities • Two Large Pets Welcome Individual Residence Features: • 1355 Home Sites • Single Family Homes • Approximately 1,140 Square Feet up to 3,765 Square Feet • Two, Three, Four, & Five Bedroom Floorplans • Private Pools • Attached Two-Car Garage • Attached Villas • Approximately 1,100 Square Feet up to 1,800 Square Feet • Screened-in Lanai • Attached One or Two-Car Garage Location: • Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club is Located at Horse and Chaise Blvd, Venice FL 34285 Nearby Amenities: • Entertainment, Dining, and Shopping in Downtown Venice • Venice Municipal Airport • Gulf of Mexico Beaches • Venetian Waterway Park • Oscar Scherer State Park • Legacy Bike Trail • Pinebrook Fit Park • Capri Isles Golf Club School District: • Garden Elementary School • Venice Area Middle School • Venice Senior High School Resources: • Pelican Pointe Club • About Venice *Information deemed reliable but not guaranteed Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club Homes & Villas For Sale Below are all of the homes and villas currently available for sale at Pelican Pointe Golf and Country Club in Venice, Florida. Please contact Hunt Brothers Realty if you would like to schedule a tour of any of the properties below. If no properties are shown below, then none are currently available for sale.  If you would like to be put on a mailing list to be notified of new listings in this particular community please send us an e-mail or give us a call. Well-groomed fairways and greens keep Pelican Pointe Golf & Country Club difficult yet friendly, and the staff can offer tips and tricks for playing your best round. Pelican Pointe Golf & Country Club is a terrific choice for your regular rounds of golf or a new destination for you and friends when visiting Venice. more... Pelican Pointe Golf Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Greater Sarasota Golf Communities Pelican Pointe Golf Club Pelican Pointe Golf Club is a semi-private non-equity golf club in Venice, Florida. A gated golf community featuring 27 holes of championship golf. Further, the club offers excellent practice facilities. There is a driving range, a large putting green, a separate green side practice bunker, chipping and pitching green. In addition to the golf, members will enjoy an Olympic-sized swimming pool, Tennis courts, Pickleball courts, Bocce ball, and fitness center. Also, the 22,000-square-foot clubhouse has a full-service restaurant and bar. Notably, the course has been Voted the No. 1 best semi-private golf course in Venice for 18 straight years! Finally, Pelican Pointe is a master-planned community that includes 1,355 homes. It is spread across 1,000 acres that include natural preserves, wetlands, and endless wildlife. The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities. Contact us today for more information. Location: Venice Florida Club Type: Semi-Private Country Club Membership Type: Non-Equity (one-time initiation fee or pay as you play) Real Estate Pelican Pointe Homes: $425,000 – $1,200,000 View Homes For Sale The Naples Golf Guy Team has 20 years of experience helping Buyers and Sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida. Call, text or email us today for more information. Stay informed with automatic property alerts… Learn what your home is worth… Sign up for our monthly market report. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Home - Pelican Point Investments About Our Company Focus Areas & Ventures Our Philosophy Philanthropy Services Our Services Our Products & Capabilities Sample Deals Portfolio Commodities News Team Our Team & Partners Our Advisory Committee FINRA Disclaimer Contact Us Select Page Our Company Pelican Point Investment Group is a merchant bank providing direct investment & co-investment, capital advisory & introduction, bridge financing, as well as debt and equity raise capabilities. Our partners range in size from post-seed to mature enterprises and are in various sectors operating in numerous markets around the globe. Our Services We leverage our knowledge, experiences, contacts, relationships, and our collaborative nature to ensure our clients’ achieve their goals. We provide the following services to our clients. More Our Products & Capabilities We identify optimal structures, lenders and investors, strategic partners, and risk management strategies to facilitate our clients strategic objectives in the following areas. More Our Philosophy We partner in our clients’ success over time via long-term relationships built on trust, enhanced creativity, thoughtful ideas and solutions, tenacious execution and 3rd party collaboration. More Our Clients We work with clients of various sizes and at different stages of maturity in the following industries OUR COMPANY Pelican Point Investment Group is a merchant bank providing direct investment & co-investment, capital advisory & introduction, bridge financing, as well as debt and equity raise capabilities. Our partners range in size from post-seed to mature enterprises and are in various sectors operating in numerous markets around the globe. FOCUS AREAS & VENTURES Financial Technology Financial Services Media / Entertainment / Social Media Commercial Real Estate Healthcare / Bio-tech / Life Science Specialty Finance Middle Market Lending Energy / Clean Tech Technology Global Opportunities Hospitality Commodities / Natural Resources OUR PHILOSOPHY We partner in our clients’ success over time via long-term relationships built on trust, enhanced creativity, thoughtful ideas and solutions, tenacious execution and 3rd party collaboration. Pelican Point’s principals are trust, passion, creativity, and results. Our firm finds its success directly and indirectly investing and by being entrusted by our clients, 3rd party investors, lenders, advisors and other participants in the investment and lending community. This trust provides us access to the relevant players and top class ideas available in the market. Given our philosophy and the stage of growth that many of our clients are in, we are open to being creative in how we are compensated and will seek a way to be aligned with our clients.  We are comfortable and fond of the notion that our success comes in line with our clients. PHILANTHROPY Our Partners have supported the following charitable and non-profit organizations that have the hopes of bridging income gaps, eradicating extreme poverty, enabling the poor and needy through education, sanitation initiatives, expanding hopes & minds and developing talent no matter where it stems from. Our success reminds us of the need to support our communities, causes dear to each of us, initiatives for change and betterment that exist locally and globally. Where we have been fortunate enough to afford comfort, safety, health so many more worry about basic needs. Crohn’s & Colitis Foundation of America August 21, 2016 American India Foundation August 21, 2016 DIL August 21, 2016 Special Olympics World Games August 21, 2016 Autism Speaks August 20, 2016 Pratham USA August 19, 2016 OUR SERVICES We leverage our knowledge, experiences, contacts, deep relationships and our collaborative nature to ensure our clients’ achieve their goals. We provide the following services to our clients: Bridge / Mezzanine Financing – Debt Placement Advising & Structuring in JV Vehicles Corporate Advisory Loan Origination Real Estate Investment JV Vehicles Capital Formation / Fund Raising OUR PRODUCTS & CAPABILITIES: We identify optimal structures, lenders and investors, strategic partners, and risk management strategies to facilitate our clients strategic objectives in the following areas. Asset Purchases / Sales Business Acquisitions / Sales Roll-up strategies Leverage (Asset Based, Lines of Credit, Receivable Linked, Real Estate Secured and Other Bespoke Financing that can be both Secured and Unsecured) Strategic Advisory in Organic Growth & Inorganic Growth Opportunities Risk Off-lay Structures & Insurance / Re-insurance Risk Partnering & Sharing Structures Capital / Risk Planning and Allocation Referral Structures Bridge Financing for Growth Companies with Private or Public Take-Out Potential Co-Investment or Direct investment with Partners Capital SAMPLE DEALS DONE BY OUR PARTNERS Options Group International, LLC – Co Founder, Co President, CFO –One of leading global executive search consulting firms focused on financial institutions. $500 million term leverage and liquidity line for a global leading hedge fund (by AUM) allowing 20+ various investment focus funds under the manager to access bridge liquidity, leverage for approved strategies and provide gearing in funds portfolio’s to achieve performance targets all secured by each funds own equity. Paradise Multimedia Inc., – CEO/Chairman – design, manufacture and distributor of networking and multimedia products, internet set boxes, sold the company to a Singapore based conglomerate. Agama, Inc. – Partner – With 3 other partners conducted a management buyout of a publicly held company and transitioned into mergers and acquisitions of networking and emerging technology companies, leading to roll-ups and consolidation of particular sectors within technology. USD 750 Million secured loan structure providing a leading global investment bank access to term liquidity under repurchase agreement like protections to finance structured products, mortgages and other debt securities for multiyear term. 200 million re-insurance structured product sold to private investors allowing a US national insurance company to reduce capital allocation to a profitable but concentrated and growing business line. Swap & Derivatives portfolio novation with Large US Money Center Bank. Pacific Rim Entertainment, Inc. – CEO/Chairman – a primetime animation Production Company with offices in Beverly Hills, Manila, Philippines and Shenzhen, China. Sold assets to Disney, Tele-mage France and CBS Canada. This appointment of Filipp to Pelican’s advisory... read more « Older Entries OUR TEAM & PARTNERS IKE SURI Chairman / CEO Ike Suri is currently the Chairman and CEO of Pelican Point Investment Group LLC (“PPI”), a boutique Private Equity & Merchant Bank in Newport Beach, California. He also serves as the Chairman of Fundingshield, LLC, a loan level fraud prevention company for handling the funding process which mitigates fraud perpetrated by closing agents. Prior to PPI, Ike was the Co-CEO and Co- Founder of Pelican Point Capital Partners, LLC  for three years. . He also has served as a CEO, Chairman, board member and adviser to private and public companies and continues to advise companies as an adviser, principal & owner/operator. Ike is a “serial entrepreneur” and founding charter member of The IndUS Entrepreneurs (TiE- South Coast). He served as a board member of Trilennia Group, a mid-market merchant banking firm and a member of the Turnaround Management Association (TMA). Ike is a Co-Founder and was Co-President and CFO for Options Group, a leading Wall Street-based executive search and consulting firm with offices in 11 countries. Ike served as CEO and Chairman of Paradise Multimedia, Inc., a spin-off acquired from Phillips Corp. of NA. He also served as Chairman and CEO of Pacific Rim Entertainment Inc., a prime-time animation production company of which he sold select assets to Disney. Ike originated structured and integrated acquisitions in 6 technology consolidation/roll-ups in the networking spectrum and related industries. From networking technologies in Ethernet, Token Ring, switches, routers, fiber optic codecs (applications) and wireless synthesizers, his team acquired these companies from companies such as Raytheon, Rockwell Network Systems, Westinghouse, Meret Optical, Sciteq, Relialogic and Phillips. He was part of a leadership team for acquisitions that helped build Sorrento Networks. Sorrento Networks reached a market capitalization of approximately $1.6b as a listed Nasdaq company. Ike was instrumental in helping the company acquire 8 companies in the roll-up strategy and further spun off 2 subsidiaries as separately listed public companies called Entrada Networks & DPI. Ike is also Managing Director of Azemuth, Inc., a Suri family office making principal investments since the mid-1990’s. His primary focus has centered in building enterprise value via investments and by Mergers & Acquisitions. He has a long history of working with leading organizations across various industry sectors including Financial Services, Real-Estate, Information Technology, Med-tech, Health Care, Food and Beverage and Social Media. Ike attended Delhi University’s Sri Ram College of Commerce and further completed Undergraduate and Graduate course work in Finance and Marketing at Rutgers University. LinkedIn ADAM J. CHAUDHARY President Adam J. Chaudhary is currently the President of Pelican Point Investments Group LLC (“PPI”), a boutique Private Equity & Merchant Bank in Newport Beach, California. He also serves as the President of Fundingshield, LLC, a loan level fraud prevention company for handling the funding process which mitigates fraud perpetrated by closing agents, compliance with state closing requirements and adherence to regulations.  Prior to PPI, he was the Managing Director for Pelican Point Capital Partners, LLC., Vice President at Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) responsible for US Dollar structured funding and managed the cross asset solutions team. In these roles, he developed and executed secured borrowings and capital solution products and oversaw the development of interest rate, FX, equity, credit hedging and alpha products for banks, insurers, hedge funds and specialty finance companies. At RBS, he also conducted the successful workout and renegotiation of a USD 9 billion loan portfolio while living between London and New York and also worked with Her Majesty’s Treasury risk consultants in defining the scope and need for portfolio insurance products. Previously, Adam was a trader in the Fund Derivatives Group at Greenwich Capital where he risk managed a USD 5 billion portfolio of loan and derivative products secured by fund equity for global hedge funds & fund of hedge funds. He was Summer Analyst at Goldman Sachs in the Fixed Income Currencies and Commodities Division on the structured credit correlation marketing and structuring team. Adam also served as a project manager for GreenPoint Credit, a sub-prime mortgage servicer focused on chattel and manufactured housing loans, where he developed cost analysis models used by the then treasury team and head of securitization. Adam is an avid fan of global music and a percussionist by hobby and has begun to take steps to combine these passions with charities including Development in Literacy (DIL) which promotes increasing literacy rates and women’s education in Pakistan. Adam holds Series 7 and 63 licenses from FINRA and obtained a Bachelor of Science in Finance and International Relations from Bentley College in Waltham, Massachusetts. He has also obtained certificates in credit products & derivatives from the New York Institute of Finance.
